detail.generalNote: If filled, these fields have a higher priority than the GPSR information at the products (Catalogues > Products > GPSR Information)
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextActive: If active, warning/safety note will be displayed.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextInternalName: The internal name is needed for display in the administration.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextInternalId: The internal ID is needed for display in the administration, imports and API connections.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextInternalNote: The internal note is required for display in the administration.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextType: The note type is required for display and sorting in the administration.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextPriority: The higher the priority, the further forward the warning/safety note is ranked in the display.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextSalesChannel: OR link: The display takes place if at least one of the assigned sales channels applies. If no sales channel is added, the display always takes place.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextProductStream: OR link: The warning/safety notice is displayed for all products in the dynamic product groups.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextRule: OR link: The display takes place if at least one of the assigned rules is true. If no rule is added, the display always takes place.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextHeadline: If no text is entered here, the following text snippet is automatically used: "acrisGpsr.gpsrHeadline"
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextDisplayType: If the option â€™In GPSR tab' is selected, the information from manufacturers, responsible persons and the warning/safety notes are loaded in one tab, provided they have also selected the GPSR tab option.
detail.fieldTitleTabLink: The following snippet is used for the tab text: acrisGpsr.gpsrTabNote
detail.fieldTitleGpsrTabLink: The following snippet is used for the tab text: acrisGpsr.gpsrTab
detail.fieldTitleModalText: Info text for opening the modal window
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextModalText: If no text is entered here, the following text snippet is automatically used: "acrisGpsr.gpsrModalInfoText"
detail.fieldTitleModalLinkText: Link text for opening the modal window
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextModalLinkText: If no text is entered here, the following text snippet is automatically used: "acrisGpsr.gpsrModalLinkText"
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextSeparator: If active, a separator line is displayed between the warning/safety instructions.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextHeadlineIndividualSize: Select an individual size for the headline. If no individual size is selected, it depends on the SEO tag.
detail.fieldOptionPositionLeft: To the left of the text
detail.fieldOptionPositionRight: To the right of the text
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextImgSize: Input in pixels. If no value or 0 is entered, a standard width of 100px is selected.
detail.fieldTitleHintMobileVisible: Show warning/safety hint for mobile devices
detail.messageSaveError: The warning/safety note could not be saved.
detail.messageSaveSuccess: The warning/safety note has been saved.
